alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dimmit and south central Zavala Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Las Colonias, or near Crystal City, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crystal City, Big Wells, Las Colonias, Chula Vista-River Spur and Brundage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
